001
002package com.commercetools.api.json;
003
004import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.modules.ModuleOptions;
005
006public class ApiModuleOptions implements ModuleOptions {
007    public static final String DESERIALIZE_DATE_ATTRIBUTE_AS_STRING = "commercetools.deserializeDateAttributeAsString";
008    public static final String DESERIALIZE_DATE_FIELD_AS_STRING = "commercetools.deserializeDateFieldAsString";
009
010    private final Boolean dateAttributeAsString;
011    private final Boolean dateCustomFieldAsString;
012
013    private ApiModuleOptions() {
014        this.dateAttributeAsString = false;
015        this.dateCustomFieldAsString = false;
016    }
017
018    private ApiModuleOptions(Boolean dateAttributeAsString, Boolean dateCustomFieldAsString) {
019        this.dateAttributeAsString = dateAttributeAsString;
020        this.dateCustomFieldAsString = dateCustomFieldAsString;
021    }
022
023    public static ApiModuleOptions of() {
024        return new ApiModuleOptions();
025    }
026
027    public Boolean getDateAttributeAsString() {
028        return dateAttributeAsString;
029    }
030
031    public Boolean getDateCustomFieldAsString() {
032        return dateCustomFieldAsString;
033    }
034
035    public ApiModuleOptions withDateCustomFieldAsString(Boolean dateCustomFieldAsString) {
036        return new ApiModuleOptions(dateAttributeAsString, dateCustomFieldAsString);
037    }
038
039    public ApiModuleOptions withDateAttributeAsString(Boolean dateAttributeAsString) {
040        return new ApiModuleOptions(dateAttributeAsString, dateCustomFieldAsString);
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public String getOption(String name) {
045        if (name.equals(DESERIALIZE_DATE_ATTRIBUTE_AS_STRING)) {
046            return dateAttributeAsString.toString();
047        }
048        if (name.equals(DESERIALIZE_DATE_FIELD_AS_STRING)) {
049            return dateCustomFieldAsString.toString();
050        }
051        return null;
052    }
053}
